name: CAN'T TOUCH THIS (David Martin Almazan)
description:
Description

Can't Touch This is an arcade-style game developed for the PC in which the player will have to shoot the red cubes to increase the high score and will have to dodge the green ones. If you shoot the green, you will instantly lose, as you have shot what would be a "civilian".

Controls

Left Click - Shoot
R - Reload
Escape - Quit
